title: Crossword Level Schema
description: Canonical schema for grid_json and clues_json stored in the levels table and returned by getLevel.

number.description: Clue number shown in the top-left corner of the cell. Only present on the first cell of an Across or Down word.

rows.description: Total number of rows in the grid.

cols.description: Total number of columns in the grid.

cells.description: Flat list of all cells. Every (row, col) position within [0, rows) × [0, cols) must appear exactly once.

number.description: Clue number. Matches the 'number' field on the corresponding GridCell.

clue.description: Human-readable clue text shown to the player.

answer_length.description: Number of letters in the correct answer.

start.description: Grid position of the first letter of the answer.

across.description: All Across clues, ordered by clue number ascending.

down.description: All Down clues, ordered by clue number ascending.

answerKeys.description: When sending answers in submitScore, keys must be formatted as '<number><direction>' where direction is 'A' (Across) or 'D' (Down). Examples: '1A', '10D', '23A'.

notes.cellCoverage: Every letter cell must belong to at least one Across and/or one Down clue. A cell that belongs to no clue is invalid.
notes.symmetry: Standard crossword grids use 180° rotational symmetry for black cells, but this is not enforced by this schema.
notes.serverOnly: The correct answer strings are NEVER included in getLevel responses. Only clue text and answer_length are returned. The client must infer word positions from grid_json.
